description: Create system users and groups. If the config file is not specified, files in the sysusers.d directories are used. More information: https://www.freedesktop.org/software/systemd/man/systemd-sysusers.html.

useCases.description: Create users and groups from a specific configuration file:
Process configuration files and print what would be done without actually doing anything:
Print the contents of all configuration files (before each file, its name is printed as a comment):
